title: Welcome to My Analytics Lab
text:
Hello, I’m Gökhan Polat,
an Industrial Engineering student with a passion for data analytics, sustainable development, and technology-driven solutions. On this website, I’ll be sharing my latest projects, insights into data analysis, and much more.
Feel free to connect and follow along!
